name: HookDashShot
description:
HookDashShot is a speedrunning, sidescrolling platformer where the player uses the Grappling Hook, Recoil Gun, Dash ability, and Double-Jump ability to traverse platforms to the finish line.

Currently, the game is In Development. The Grappling Hook and Recoil Gun need to be added, as well as levels, the main screen, the timer, a tutorial, a score mechanic, and a death mechanic. The tileset art also needs to be made. Right now, the movement mechanics, including the dash and double-jump, are out.

The game is expected to be finished by next week, around 08/17/22. The files out currently are not complete, so expect changes the next time you check the page.

Have fun, E8BB!

Controls: WASD / Arrow keys for movement, Space for Dash, W / Up for Double-Jump, R for Reset
